渹渹渹

渹字的基本解释

渹
hōng
水冲击声：渹渹沌沌。渹湱（浪涛冲击声）澎湃。

渹
qìng
冷：“时盛暑之月，丞相以腹熨弹棋局，曰：‘何乃渹！’”

渹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hōng］
［《廣韻》呼宏切，平耕，曉。］
波浪相激声。参见“渹湱”、“渹渹”。
[②]［qìng］
［《集韻》楚慶切，去映，初。］
方言。冷。

渹字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渹； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页635第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?呼宏切，音轟。【玉篇】水浪渹渹聲。一曰水石相激聲。或作?。　又吳音何乃渹，猶言那行。【世說】劉眞長見王導，導以腹熨彈碁局，曰：何乃渹。劉出曰：未見他異，惟聞吳語。　又【集韻】楚慶切，請去聲。與㵾同。冷也。吳人謂之㵾。　又【字牖】江東呼厭極爲渹。音罄。

渹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
渹字的起名意思

指波浪相激的声音。

渹
Basic explanation of words
渹
hōng
Water impact sound: Chaos and Chaos. Lu Yan (the sound of waves crashing) surging.
渹
qìng
Cold: "In the hot summer months, the prime minister used his belly to press the chess game and said: "He Naibo!""
渹
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hōng］
["Guangyun" Hu Hongqie, flat farming, dawn. ]
The waves are surging. See "Yu", "Yu".
[②]［qìng］
["Ji Yun" Chu Qing cut, went to film, early. ]
dialect. cold.
渹
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　渹; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 635 No. 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Hong cut, sound boom. [Jade articles] The sound of water waves. One said, the sound of water and rock. Or for?.　Wu Yinhe Nailu again, he still said what he did. [World Talk] Liu Yuchang met Director Wang, and guided him to play the game with his belly, saying: He Nailu. Liu Chu said: He has not seen any difference, but only hears of Wu dialect.　[Ji Yun] Chu Qingqie, please go. Same as 㵾. It's also cold. Wu people call it 㵾.　 [word 牖] Jiangdong is very tired. The sound is exhausted.
